languages.text: "Я бы осторожнее использовал слово "невинные", учитывая то, о чьих коллегах идет речь".
"I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."
languages.original_text: "Я бы осторожнее использовал слово "невинные", учитывая то, о чьих коллегах идет речь".

traits.locale_text: "I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."
"I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."
"I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."
"I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."

languages.text: 「俺たちが話題にしている者の仲間に『無実の者』という言葉を使うには用心したいところだ」
languages.original_text: "I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちが話題にしている者の仲間に『無実の者』という言葉を使うには用心したいところだ」

languages.text: “鉴于我们正在讨论的是某人的同事，我会谨慎使用‘无辜’这个词。”
languages.original_text: "I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."

traits.locale_text: “鉴于我们正在讨论的是某人的同事，我会谨慎使用‘无辜’这个词。”

languages.text: « Le mot "innocent" n'est peut-être pas le mieux choisi pour faire référence à ses collègues. »
languages.original_text: "I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."

traits.locale_text: « Le mot "innocent" n'est peut-être pas le mieux choisi pour faire référence à ses collègues. »

languages.text: «Yo que usted tendría cuidado con la palabra "inocente", dado de quién son los compañeros de los que estamos hablando».
languages.original_text: "I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."

traits.locale_text: «Yo que usted tendría cuidado con la palabra "inocente", dado de quién son los compañeros de los que estamos hablando».

languages.text: "Ich wäre hinsichtlich der Verwendung des Wortes 'unschuldig' vorsichtig, wenn man bedenkt, von welchen Kollegen wir sprechen."
languages.original_text: "I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wäre hinsichtlich der Verwendung des Wortes 'unschuldig' vorsichtig, wenn man bedenkt, von welchen Kollegen wir sprechen."

languages.text: "Masum demek, biraz ağır bir itham oluyor bence. Kime çalıştıkları malum."
languages.original_text: "I would be careful about using the word 'innocent,' given whose colleagues we are talking about."

traits.locale_text: "Masum demek, biraz ağır bir itham oluyor bence. Kime çalıştıkları malum."
